title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7308.2 - Visitation area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7308.2 - Visitation area

State Regulations
(a) Each
facility shall provide sufficient space for a visiting room or an area designed
to allow for physical contact between a youth and his or her
visitors. (b) Each facility shall
provide for the proper storage of visitors' coats, handbags and other personal
items not allowed into the visiting area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7308.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
